meta.title: Create a Payment Card
meta.description: Enables the the User to add new Payment Card, which could be needed in cases when the User would like to replace existing Payment Card because: - it expired - is empty - the User prefers another one to be used from now on

meta.title: Create a Payment Card
meta.description: Enables the the User to add new Payment Card, which could be needed in cases when the User would like to replace existing Payment Card because: - it expired - is empty - the User prefers another one to be used from now on. Using the optional `mark_as_default` field one can mark just created Payment Card as the default one.

meta.title: List all Payment Cards belonging to a given user
meta.description: Enables the the User to list all of the Payment Cards which were added by him / her. Among all returned Payment Cards there must be one and only one which is marked as **default**.

meta.title: Remove a given Payment Card belonging to a given user
meta.description: Enables the the User to remove a specific Payment Card which were added by him / her. Payment Card can be removed only if it's not a default one.

meta.title: Mark a given Payment Card as a default one
meta.description: Enables the the User to mark a specific Payment Card as a default one, meaning that it will be used for all upcoming payments. Marking Payment Card as a default one automatically leads to the unmarking of any Payment Card which was default one before the invocation of the command.

meta.title: Pay using the default Payment Card
meta.description: User is allowed only to perform payments against her default Payment Card. In other words on order to use a given Payment Card one has to mark is as default. Also one is not allowed to perform such payments freely and therefore we expect to get a `payment_token` inside which another piece of our system encoded allowed sum to be paid.

meta.title: List all Invoices belonging to a given user
meta.description: Enables the the User to list all of the Invoices which were generated for his Donations or Subscription payments.

meta.title: Calculate debt for a given user
meta.description: Calculate debt for a given user by searching for the latest unpaid invoice. It returns payment token which can be used in the PAID_WITH_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_CARD command

meta.title: Request a subscription change
meta.description: Whenever the user wants to change her subscription it must happen through this endpoint. It's still possible that the subscription will change without user asking for it, but that can happen when downgrading due to missing payment.

meta.title: Check if one can attempt a request displaying donation
meta.description: Since we don't want to overflow user with unnecessary requests for him donating we do it in a smarter way using set of heuristics that together help us to answer the following question: "Is it the best moment to ask for the donation?". Currently we use the following heuristics: - is account old enough? - whether user recently donated - whether we attempted recently to request donation from the user - if the user in a good mood (after doing some successful recalls)

meta.title: Create donation attempt for authenticated user
meta.description: Each Donation Attempt should be followed by creation of Donation Attempt model instance to reflect that fact. It allows one to track how many times we asked a certain user about the donation in order not to overflow that user with them and not to be too aggressive.

meta.title: Register donation from authenticated user
meta.description: One can perform a donation payment even as an authenticated user.

meta.title: Register anonymous donation
meta.description: One can perform a donation payment even if not being an authenticated user. Even in that case we cannot allow full anonymity and we must require at least email address to send information regarding the status of the payment.

meta.title: Update the status of a given Payment
meta.description: Update the Payment instance identified by the `session_id`. This command is for external use only therefore it doesn't expose internal ids of the payments but rather session id.

meta.title: Create or Read External App configuration
Read External App configuration by URI
Authorize a given external app token
meta.description: Can be called by the API Gateway in order to authorize every request using provided token. It must be used only for external app tokens, which are used by the external apps to make calls on behalf of a given user.

meta.title: Create Account
meta.description: Creates User and Account if provided data are valid.

meta.title: Bulk Read Mentors' Account
meta.description: Enable one to Read all available Mentor accounts

meta.title: Sign In
meta.description: Validates data provided on the input and if successful returns auth token.

meta.title: Refresh JWT token
meta.description: Should be used whenever token is close to expiry or if one is requested to refresh the token because for example account type was changed and new token should be requested to reflect that change.

meta.title: Authorize a given token
meta.description: Can be called by the API Gateway in order to authorize every request using provided token.

meta.title: Read My Account
meta.description: Read my Account data.

meta.title: Update My Account
meta.description: Update my Account data.

meta.title: Send Account Activation Email
meta.description: Send an Email containing the confirmation link which when clicked kicks of the Account Activation. Even though the activation email is send automatically during the Sign Up phase one should have a way to send it again in case it was not delivered.

meta.title: Activate Account
meta.description: Activate Account by decoding the `code` which contains the confirmation off the intent and was signed by the user itself.

meta.title: Reset Password
meta.description: Enables one to reset her password in case the old one cannot be recalled.

meta.title: Send Reset Password Email
meta.description: Send an Email containing the confirmation link which when clicked kicks of the real Reset Password operation.

meta.title: Change Password
meta.description: Enables one to change one's password for an authenticated user.

meta.title: Send Authenticated Contact Message
meta.description: Send the Contact Message immediately since it's already for an existing and authenticated user.

meta.title: Create Anonymous Contact Attempt
meta.description: Enables one to send messages to CoSphere's support even if the sender is not authenticated.

meta.title: Verify the contact attempt
meta.description: Verify the correctness of provided verification code and send the message to the CoSphere's support. This mechanism is used for anonymous users only.

meta.description: List Attempts for a specific Card given by its Id.

meta.title: Update Attempt
meta.description: Update existing Attempt with new cells and / or style.

meta.title: Create Attempt Stat
meta.description: Create Attempt Stat which stores information about basis statistics of a particular recall attempt.

meta.title: List Attempt Stats
meta.description: List Attempt Stats by filtering existing ones.

meta.title: Create External Attempt Stat
meta.description: Create External Attempt Stat meaning one which was rendered elsewhere in any of the multiple CoSphere apps.

meta.title: Create Recall Session
meta.description: Render Recall Session composed out of the sequence of Cards that should be recalled in a given order. Based on the RecallAttempt stats recommend another Card to recall in order to maximize the recall speed and success rate.

meta.title: Read Recall Summary
meta.description: Read summary stats for cards and their recall_score for a given User.

meta.title: Creating a single Card
meta.description: Enables one to create a single Card instance.

meta.title: Creating a single Card
meta.description: Enables one to create a single Card instance.

meta.title: Bulk Read Multiple Cards
meta.description: List subset of Cards depending on various filtering flags.

meta.title: Remove Card
meta.description: Remove list of Cards specified by their ids.

meta.title: Update Path
meta.description: Endpoint for Updating Path.

meta.title: Create Path
meta.description: Endpoint for Creating Path.

meta.title: List Paths
meta.description: List all user's Paths

meta.title: Delete Paths
meta.description: Endpoint for Deleting multiple Paths.

meta.title: Read Graph
meta.description: Render and read Graph made out of all Cards and Links belonging to a given user.

meta.title: List Geometries
meta.description: List Geometries.

meta.title: Bulk Update Geometries
meta.description: Update in a Bulk list of Geometries.

meta.title: Read Geometry by Card
meta.description: Read a Geometry entity given the id of Card which is the parent of the Geometry entity.

meta.title: Read or Create Link
meta.description: Read or Create a Link between two cards.

meta.title: Remove Link
meta.description: Remove a Link between two cards.

meta.title: Creating a single Hashtag
meta.description: Enables one to create a single Hashtag instance.

meta.title: List Hashtags
meta.description: Enables one to list a series of Hashtag instances. It accepts various query parameters such as: - `limit` - `offset` - `first_character`

meta.title: Updating a single Hashtag
meta.description: Enables one to update a single Hashtag instance with a list of `card_ids` to which it should get attached to.

meta.title: Removing a single Hashtag
meta.description: Enables one to detach a single Hashtag instance from a list cards given by `card_ids`.

meta.title: List Hashtags TOC
meta.description: Enables one to list Hashtags Table of Contents made out of Hashtags. Note: Currently this endpoint returns only a flat list of hashtags with the count of Cards with which they're attached to. In the future though one could propose a mechanism which could calculate hierarchy between those hashtags (parent - child relationships) and ordering based on the knowledge grid topology. It accepts various query parameters such as: - `limit` - `offset`

meta.description: Read or Create MediaItem instance.

meta.description: Read MediaItem

meta.description: Update MediaItem instance.

meta.description: Remove MediaItem instance.

meta.title: Read By Process Id
meta.description: Read MediaItem by Process Id

meta.title: Update MediaItem Representation
meta.description: Update given MediaItem with only the fields which are decided externally (using external services). Fields like: - `web_representations` - `thumbnail_uri` - `meta` - `text` All of those fields are computed in smarter way in order to make the MediaItem way better in a semantic sense. Those fields are perceived as the `representation` of a given MediaItem since they contains information about how to display a given MediaItem, how to understand it etc. It goes beyond the simple abstract data oriented representation (uri, extension etc.).

meta.title: List Words
meta.description: List Words by first character. It allows one to fetch list of words by first character.

meta.title: Render Narratives and Spots for a given Scener Game
meta.description: This Command allos one to update `start` and `stop` fields of each `narrative` and also fill the `correct` field of each `SPOT` challenge found among all `challenges`.

meta.title: Detect language for a given role
Synthesize speech from text for a given language and role
